faulty

Class Process

  • java.lang.Object
    • faulty.Process

  • public class Process
extends java.lang.Object
    Process is a basic class to capture the behavior of a process, it contains the basic information of a process: a list of vars, the channels used, etc. It also provides methods to produce the corresponding BDD.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Process(java.lang.String name, int numberVar, int numberChan, int numberBranch, int numberInst, mc.BDDModel model)
      Basic constructor for class Process, it creates the basic structures for the class
      Process(java.lang.String name, int numberVar, int numberChan, int numberBranch, int numberInst, mc.BDDModel model, boolean blocking)
      Another constructor for class Process, it creates the basic structures for the class and allows to set disableBlocking

        Basic constructor for class Process, it creates the basic structures for the class
        Parameters:
        name - a name for the process, it actually is a
        numberVar - the number of int variables
        numberChan - the number of channels used by this process
        numberBranch - the number of branches of the process
        numberInst - number of instances of this process

      • getBDD

        public net.sf.javabdd.BDD getBDD()
        Calculates the BDD the represent the current process, it takes into account the bbranching in the code and the stuck variables that indicate whether a process is stuck or not.

      • skipBDD

        public net.sf.javabdd.BDD skipBDD()
        It returns a BDD representing a skip step for the process, this is needed for the interleaving semantics. The returned BDD represents not changed for the process TBD: What about deadlock?
